name: Ledian
flavorText:
When the stars
flicker in the
night sky, it flutters about,
scattering a
glowing powder.

previous.name: Ledyba
previous.flavorText:
It is very timid.
It will be afraid
to move if it is alone. But it will
be active if it is
in a group.

next.name: Spinarak
next.flavorText:
It lies still in
the same pose for
days in its web, waiting for its
unsuspecting prey
to wander close.
